timeline.bodyText:
No use the registry to get all your registered jobs.
No static stuff.
timeline.author: OrionDevelopment

replies.bodyText: I tried that, how do I do that without getting the placeholder and shit?
replies.author: Raycoms

replies.bodyText: btw, I only want minecolonies jobs, because other mods have to register their own sounds
replies.author: Raycoms

replies.bodyText:
You can do both perfectly fine. Filter on the minecolonies namespace and just filter out all jobs you do not care for.
Sent from my Honor 7X using FastHub
replies.author: OrionDevelopment

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/api/java/com/minecolonies/api/colony/jobs/ModJobs.java b/src/api/java/com/minecolonies/api/colony/jobs/ModJobs.java
index 823abec75..3b04363f7 100644
--- a/src/api/java/com/minecolonies/api/colony/jobs/ModJobs.java
+++ b/src/api/java/com/minecolonies/api/colony/jobs/ModJobs.java

@@ -77,45 +77,4 @@ public final class ModJobs
     {
         throw new IllegalStateException("Tried to initialize: ModJobs but this is a Utility class.");
     }
-
-    /**
-     * Get a list of all jobs.
-     * @return the list.
-     */
-    public static JobEntry[] getJobs()
-    {
-        return new JobEntry[]
-                 {
-                   builder,
-                   delivery,
-                   miner,
-                   lumberjack,
-                   farmer,
-                   fisherman,
-                   baker,
-                   cook,
-                   shepherd,
-                   cowboy,
-                   swineHerder,
-                   chickenHerder,
-                   smelter,
-                   ranger,
-                   knight,
-                   student,
-                   archer,
-                   composter,
-                   sawmill,
-                   blacksmith,
-                   stoneMason,
-                   stoneSmeltery,
-                   crusher,
-                   sifter,
-                   florist,
-                   enchanter,
-                   researcher,
-                   healer,
-                   pupil,
-                   teacher
-                 };
-    }
 }

timeline.bodyText: Why does this class still exist?
timeline.author: OrionDevelopment

replies.bodyText: They are completely different sounds which are independent of the citizen sounds.
replies.author: Raycoms
